product_description:
Ellis Faas Concealer offers high coverage to reduce the appearance of blemishes, pigmentation spots and dark circles for a flawless complexion.
Designed to work alongside Ellis Faas Skin Veil Foundation, this luxurious liquid concealer immediately blends into the skin for a flawless finish. Infused with a unique blend of Karité Oil and Rice Wax, Ellis Faas Concealer nourishes the skin whilst a fusion of Vitamins C & E hydrates the skin and protects against free radical damage.
Ellis Faas Concealer also delivers anti-ageing and regenerating properties and effectively conceals imperfections. The secret to seamless concealer coverage lies in its relation to the foundation colour: darker skin demands more contrast between concealer and foundation, while lighter skin requires foundation and concealer that are more similar in colour. Paired with Skin Veil Foundation, Ellis Faas Concealer accommodates these dramatic differences in the requirements of different skin tones.
The award-winning pen format with brush applicator ensures precise application whilst the sleek and sophisticated packaging design fits perfectly in the Ellis Faas Holder Classic or Clips to keep your makeup organised like a professional.
Ellis Faas Concealer leaves the complexion looking flawless with all imperfections such as dark circles, blemishes and areas of pigmentation beautifully concealed.

Cover FX Custom Cover Drops is an innovative concentrated pigment which allows you to customise your foundation.
A true Beauty Bay innovation, Custom Cover Drops can be mixed with any liquid makeup to add additional coverage; from creating tinted moisturisers, serums and oils from scratch or deepening the coverage of your favourite foundation or primer, Custom Cover Drops offer unprecedented control allowing you to customise your makeup regime like never before.
Custom Cover Drops are suitable for all skin types and are formulated using Cover FX's revolutionary Flash Fusion Technology which weightlessly transforms your favourite beauty product into the sheerest tint all the way to a total coverage foundation, depending on how many drops you add. Each pigment is coated with Lechithin which is biochemically similar to the skin and ensures maximum blend-ability and the smoothest application possible.
Availablein a wide selection of shades to suit all skin tones and undertones, Custom Cover Drops is sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller and is a unique beauty product that once you try you you'll wonder how you ever lived without it.

The perfect travel set of tanning must-haves for creating a flawless bronzed finish.
Compiled by the experts over at Million Dollar Tan, the Mermaid Mousse Travel Set is essential trio of products for achieving an evenly balanced face and body tan. Consisting of two mini tanning mousses one for the face and one for the body, along with a facial tanning mitt, the set contains everything you need for topping up your bronzed glow on the go.

Cover FX Natural Finish Oil Free Foundation is a water based liquid foundation that provides hydrating, flexible sheer to full coverage for the face.
This innovative formulation has been designed to achieve a natural-looking, soft finish and provides buildable, long-wearing coverage. Deeply moisturising, Natural Finish Oil Free Foundation is free from Parabens, Fragrances, Mineral Oil and Talc and is suitable for all skin types. Grouped within the skin undertones Pink, Neutral and Golden, the lower the shade numbers the lighter the shade.
Natural Finish Oil Free Foundation is rich in Vitamins C & E which are renowned for their Antioxidant properties and helps to protect the skin from premature ageing, whilst soothing inflammation and reducing redness.
With a sheer to full coverage, Natural Finish Oil Free Foundation is perfect for achieving any look and leaves the complexion looking flawless and radiant.

Jane Iredale So Bronze is a pressed powder Mineral bronzer for an airy, glowing complexion.
Universally flattering for all skin types and tones, So Bronze is available in a selection of colour ways designed to achieve an array of sun kissed looks. Enriched with Pomegranate Extract and a blend of Minerals, So Bronze can be used to add a burst of radiance to the complexion or can be used on targeted areas to sculpt and contour the face.

Z Palette Sunset Collection Large Magnetic Palette is the ultimate customisable palette created to store your makeup simply and easily.
We are all guilty of having our makeup stashes in different drawers and leaving our palettes on messy bathroom counter tops, Z Palette's Sunset Collection Large Magnetic Palette is our makeup organising saviour!
Perfect for makeup artists and especially our makeup drawers, Sunset Collection Large Magnetic Palette allows you to put all your eye shadows, blushers and pressed powders in one compact space. Created to fit any size, shape or brand the metals pans stick to the magnetic base allowing you to mix and match both square and round pans. Sunset Collection Large Magnetic Palette has a clear window so you can see all your compacts at a glance and also features a lid that completely folds back giving you easy access to your makeup.
Magnetic stickers come with Sunset Collection Large Magnetic Palette just in case your pans don't stick to the magnet base and if you have trouble finding your favourite powder, you can write what brand and colour the powder is on the bottom of the pan or sticker so you know exactly where to find your go-to shade. Infused with Argan Oil and Shea Butter, Creamy Foundation N SPF28 helps to restore suppleness whilst smoothing the skin and correcting skin tone. Suitable for all skin types, Creamy Foundation N SPF28 utilises an innovative Stretch Film which enables this exquisite foundation to adhere perfectly to the skin and move freely with facial movement to prevent creases and fading throughout the day.
With natural looking coverage which also diminishes the appearance of imperfections, Creamy Foundation N SPF28 nourishes the skin and protects against harmful UV rays whilst working to enhance the skins barrier function, leaving the complexion looking soft and glowing with radiance.

Illamasqua Precision Ink Eyeliner is a high performance liquid eyeliner which offers long lasting and defined application.
Create striking looks with attitude that can't be ignored with this highly pigmented, waterproof eyeliner. With a luxurious fluid consistency which impart rich, effortless colour in one stroke, Precision Ink Eyeliner is perfect for use on the eyes, face and body for creating sensational makeup effects.
Precision Ink Eyeliner has an ultra-thin brush which allows for intricate sharp lines whilst the waterproof formula stays put until you decide it's time to take it off.

With the ability to add a touch of drama to the eyes with ease, Black Magic Liquid Eyeliner + Widelash certifies itself as an absolute beauty necessity that is guaranteed to become any cosmetics junkie's new best product. Featuring a long, fine brush tip, this innovative eyeliner imparts pure black to the lash line, adding the finishing touch to any look perfectly.
Infused with the uniquely formulated WIDELASH, Black Magic Liquid Eyeliner + Widelash promotes the development and growth for the lashes, magnificently enhancing the body by up to three times more in just fifteen days.
Cast a beautifully enchanting spell over the eyes with Black Magic Liquid Eyeliner + Widelash.

A lightweight, flawless finish powder foundation.

product_description:

Lightweight and fragrance free, The Sensual Skin Primer sits comfortably on the skin for all day wear. Starting by minimising pores, hydration is locked in whilst damaging environmental pollutants are locked out, keeping skin looking healthier and younger. Developed for the use of brow-lovers and makeup artists alike, the Studio Pro Ultimate Brow Palette offers options for all hair colours and finishes. Featuring four long-wearing waxes and eight ultra-blendable powders, the palette is perfect for enhancing brows; whether you want natural definition or a sculpted arch, this is an essential for any beauty collection.

Paul & Joe Moisturising Foundation Primer L is a luxurious face primer with added moisturising and skin brightening benefits.
Enriched with a signature blend of Botanical Extracts, Vitamins and Floral Waters, Moisturising Foundation Primer L nourishes, hydrates and revives dry, dull and mature skin types whilst giving your complexion a healthy, sensuous glow.
Boasting SPF18 UV protection, this brightening primer shields the skin and utilises a blend of Lavender Pearls to optimise light reflection to instantly remove dullness and add a translucent brilliance to the skin. Silver Pearl restores suppleness to the skin whilst Red Pearls unify skin tone and works with Lavender Pearl to banish dullness and counteract any brassiness, leaving the complexion looking smooth, flawless and sculpted.
Complete with a convenient pump dispenser for easy application on the go, Moisturising Foundation Primer L is suitablefor use with all foundations and helps to extend the longevity of your foundation whilst delivering exceptional skincare benefits.

Cover FX Anti Aging Primer nourishes and hydrates the skin whilst having a smoothing effect on fine lines and wrinkles for a flawless finish.
Ideal for all skin types, especially normal and dry skin, Anti Aging Primer extends the wear of your favourite Cover FX Foundation whilst ensuring the skin is hydrated.
Infused with a potent blend of multi Vitamins and Omega 3, Anti Aging Primer promotes collagen production and clarifies the skin, whilst repairing UV damage. A high content of Antioxidants prevents photo-ageing and rejuvenates the skin. Anti Aging Primer is also enriched with a Mediterranean Olive-derived emollient which improves skin elasticity and softens the skin texture for a more youthful appearance.
Anti Aging Primer leaves the skin looking flawless, radiant and youthful, whilst promoting effortless foundation application and long lasting make-up.

A volumising, lash-caring mascara ideal for adding the finishing touch to your eye look.
Created to define and lengthen every hair, the Big And Bigger Lashes Mascara is the perfect lash boosting mascara for anybody who wants to achieve a falsie finish. Stila One Step Correct is the bestselling, innovative complexion perfector which corrects, enhances and primes the skin for a flawless finish effortlessly.
This innovative, triple-swirled helix serum fabulously combines four beauty necessities into one easy step! Infusing a primer, colour-corrector, brightener and anti-ageing skincare serum, One Step Correct certifies its status as an absolute beauty essential for any cosmetic collection and takes care of all of your skin's needs.
Featuring Stila's Youth Revival Bio-Available Mineral Complex, One Step Correct works to instantly reduce the appearance of imperfections, whilst reducing fine lines, wrinkles, pores and pigmentation too. Alongside the ability to diminish the effects of ageing, this enchanting elixir also helps to moisturise and control oil production within the complexion, helping to improve the skin's texture.
One Step Correct's revolutionary formula contains three colour correcting brighteners which work harmoniously to balance the skin tone. The green tone instantly neutralises redness, concealing blemishes, whilst the lavender tone will counteract yellow undertones for a vibrant and energised complexion; finally the peach tone helps to brighten, illuminate and diminishes the appearance of sun spots too.
Boasting a weightless, creamy texture that instantly melts into the skin without a trace, Stila's One Step Correct never clogs the pores or settles into fine lines, instead it leaves beautifully natural, luminous and flawless skin that is guaranteed to get noticed.
Be bold, be beautiful, be clear with the legendary One Step Correct.

Pharaohs and Ancient Egyptians alike sought after this oil for its regenerating and Antioxidant powers and was used for its ability to cleanse and filter impurities; this key ingredient is still used in cosmetics today and is renowned for its restorative and protective benefits.
Formulated with Natural Waxes and Oils along with Antioxidants, essential Fatty Acids and Vitamins, Goddess Mascara achieves maximum coverage whilst lengthening, volumising, protecting and nourishing the lashes. The largest size palette in Z Palette's line-up, Extra Large Magnetic Palette Black allows you to put all your eye shadows, blushers and pressed powders in one compact space. 10 round metal stickers and 10 square metal stickers come with Extra Large Magnetic Palette Black just in-case your pans don't stick to the magnetic base and if you have trouble finding your favourite powder, you can write what brand and colour the powderis on the bottom of the pan or sticker so you can keep track of all your favourite shades. Lightweight, durable and eco-friendly, Extra Large Magnetic Palette Black's sleek slim design makes it ideal for makeup artists, travel and saving space in your drawers - meaning you can go ahead and add more make-up to your collection!

Dr Lipp Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is a multi-purpose lip balm which helps to heal and moisturise even the driest and most sensitive of lips.

With a thick, luxurious consistency, Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits glides effortlessly onto the lips and leaves a gorgeous glossy shine whilst eliminating chapped skin.

Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is formulated with a blend of 100% ultra-pure Medical Grade Lanolin and is free from Parabens, Colours and Flavours. Lanolin is a naturally produced blend of oils and waxes that are extracted from the wool of sheep shorn in the summer and is scientifically proved to be one of the most similar natural substances to our own skins natural blend of oils.
Historically, this high performance Lanolin formula has soothed many a woman's nipples during breastfeeding due to its ultra pure and healing properties. Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits has a truly versatile formula which helps to heal and soften dry, chapped lips, dry cuticles, feet and elbows and soothe itchy skin and eczema. It also helps to heal sore, chapped noses, sooth chapped and irritated nipples, eliminate split ends in the hair and moisturise eye lashes.
Considered by dermatologists and pharmacists alike to be one of the safest and most effective natural products to care for your skin, Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is medically proven to reduce skin roughness by up to 40% in just 1 hour, increase epithelial healing by 35% to heal wounds, burns, abrasions & minor incisions and is safe enough to ease the effects of nappy rash on infants and chapped nipples on nursing mums.
Sure to be a BeautyBay best-seller, Original Nipple Balm For Dry Skin, Luscious Lips & Glossy Bits is a handbag essential and leaves the lips lusciously soft, sexy and glossy whilst sensitive, irritated and dry skin is healed, soothed and moisturised.

product_description:
Blinc Black Lash Primer is a luxurious mascara base for added lash volume and drama.
Designed to strengthen the black pigments in your mascara and keep your mascara looking flawless throughout the day, this innovative lash primer has been created with two objectives in mind: lash treatment and lash enhancement.
Pentapeptide-17 treats the lashes by encouraging new lash growth for fuller, longer lashes over time whilst Vitamins and nourishing ingredients such as D-Panthenol and Tocopherol Acetate impart long lasting moisturisation and conditioning to protect the lashes from damage and environmental stresses.
Providing an incredible based of volume and length for your lashes, Black Lash Primer achieves the perfect lash foundation for fuller, thicker lashes. The Silicone wand separates and lengthens the lashes whilst the jet black pigmented formula helps to maintain blacker than black lashes when used with a black mascara.

ARTDECO Eye Brow Filler is a tinted eyebrow gel which has a thickening effect on your brows.
Perfect for filling in small gaps on sparse eyebrows, Eye Brow Filler creates beautifully dense eyebrows instantly whilst shaping and fixing unruly brow hairs into place. ARTDECO believes that a perfectly made-up eyebrow frames your face for a picture perfect look and has created this innovative brow gel to deliver outstanding definition.
Eye Brow Filler protects eyebrows from free radical damage and leaves the eyebrows beautifully conditioned whilst delivering a noticeable improvement in eyebrow hair structure.

product_description:
PUR Disappearing Ink 4 In 1 Concealer Pen brightens the appearance of dark circles whilst blurring blemishes and concealing imperfections.
The ideal beauty solution for sleepless nights, premature ageing and other tell-tale signs of skin stress, Disappearing Ink 4 In 1 Concealer Pen is a liquid concealer with a Mineral enriched formula which brightens and nourishes the skin.
Featuring two clinically tested complexes, Disappearing Ink 4 In 1 Concealer Pen is the ultimate complexion quick fix. Ceretin Complex softens the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and imperfections whilst a Diamond Complex uses soft Micro Spheres to blur the appearance of dark circles, blemishes and discolouration.
Ideal for the delicate eye area, Disappearing Ink 4 In 1 Concealer Pen also utilises a blend of Jojoba and Shea Butter to soothe and nurture stressed skin. Disappearing Ink 4 In 1 Concealer Pen doesn't just conceal imperfections, it corrects them with an advanced skincare formula and is available in a selection of problem solving shades.

product_description:
Louise Young Cream Blusher is a powder to cream blusher which adds a dash of natural colour to the cheeks.
The cream blusher can be applied alone without powder for a truly natural finish. The rich formula blends onto the skin to highlight and add definition to the face and accentuate your facial features for a beautiful healthy glow of colour.
The lightweight cream can be applied with a blush or with the fingertips for seamless application and offers as much or as little colour intensity as you wish. With shades available for all skin tones, Cream Blusher nourishes and protects the skin for a captivating look.

Eyeko Skinny Mascara & Eyeliner Duo ensures that the eyes can be beautifully detailed and defined.
Featuring both the Skinny Brush Mascara Black and the innovative Skinny Liquid Eyeliner, Skinny Mascara & Eyeliner Duo promises to accentuate the lashes naturally whilst adding supreme drama to the lash line effortlessly.
Perfect for those with short lashes, Skinny Mascara & Eyeliner Duo is perfect for on-the-go beautification, making it a certifiable must-have for any cosmetic enthusiast who has a busy lifestyle and is sure to become a Beauty Bay best-seller.
Get skinny instantly with the revolutionary Skinny Mascara & Eyeliner Duo.

Morphe Brushes 10CON 10 Color Concealer Palette is a specially designed selection of ten shades that guarantee a professional coverage for the complexion.
With a delightfully luscious cream-based formula, 10CON 10 Color Concealer Palette effortlessly blends into the skin creating an incredible finish that is truly inspirational. Imperfections and impurities evaporate as the concealer melts into the skin to create a beautifully blended look that will leave everyone envious.
Luxurious application is promised with this revolutionary set of shades. With a multitude of colours to choose from, 10CON 10 Color Concealer Palette has the ability to magnificently hide any inconsistencies of the skin that have previously been difficult to conceal and is suitable for all skin tones.
Whether used singularly to provide a flaw-free finish, or blended together to create a dimensional effect, this palette is an absolute beauty necessity for everybody.

A moisturising face spray.
Soothing and prepping, Mist-ified Spray On Moisturiser nourishes the skin whilst creating a healthy, dewy glow. A versatile essential, spray directly on to the face under or over makeup to target dry skin and set foundation. If preferred, apply with brushes and blenders for targeted application.

A weightless translucent setting powder.
With skin-blurring action, the Setting Powder Compact Refill is the perfect choice for oily and problematic skin types. Finely milled, the translucent powder creates a flawlessly airbrushed finish without changing the tone of your base and works effortlessly to set foundation. Never caking or settling into fine lines, it leaves a fresh matte finish and sits perfectly into the Setting Powder Compact allowing you to control shine on the go.

Eye Of Horus Maat Dark Temptress Eye Shadow Palette allures the inner goddess within to come out using decadent, velvety shades.
Based on ancient Egyptian formulas and ingredients such as Moringa Oil, Maat Dark Temptress Eye Shadow Palette ensures a fabulous finish whilst simultaneously caring for the skin. These baked shades guarantee a long-lasting effect that will entice all onlookers, and with the ability to be applied wet or dry to create different dimensional looks, this sensually packaged eye shadow palette is a certified beauty essential.
Capturing the light flawlessly, Maat Dark Temptress Eye Shadow Palette presents luscious shades that are as sultry as Maat herself. All of the Eye of Horus shadow palettes, which recently won the Best Makeup Brand award for Latest In Beauty, are infused with sun-kissed precious metals, ensuring that the palettes are reminiscent of the hot Egyptian deserts.
Maat wasthe dark Egyptian Goddess of law, justice and truth, and with this eyeshadow palette, you will be able to lay down the law, justified by the rich shades that provide a truthfully chic, empowering look.

A professionally-developed palette that comprises six concealer and foundation hues that can be used to highlight, contour and sculpt the complexion. Foundation Make Up Palette features a range of shades that offer customisable blendability and true-to-life coverage. The unique palette is ideal for all skin tones and is completely travel-friendly.

CODE Beautiful Volumising Lengthening Mascara is a revolutionary Fibre based mascara which dramatically enhances the lashes.
Formulated with amazing Build On Build Technology, Volumising Lengthening Mascara allows you to build application to fully tailor your lash look. This glossy black mascara is enriched with Vitamins and Botanical Waxes which are kind to the lashes and encourage natural growth whilst the water-resistant formula is tear proof and smudge resistant and won’t flake or clump.
Designed with an exceptional brush which delivers fabulous lift, length and volume, Volumising Lengthening Mascara leaves the lashes looking voluminous, beautifully long and gorgeous all day long.

ARTDECO Mineral Fluid Concealer is a liquid concealer formulated with Minerals.
Trace Elements and precious minerals such as Tourmaline and Calcium have been blended to create a silky textured concealer which dries fast and offers a perfectly natural looking coverage.
Stimulating micro-circulation, natural Shine Particles give a glowing and flawless finish whilst the non-oily texture ensures the concealer is long lasting.
Free from Talc, Wax and Oil ARTDECO Mineral Fluid Concealer is suitable for sensitive skin and features a brush applicator with a practical rotating mechanism that makes application easy and precise ensuring the perfect coverage every time.

A catwalk ready collection of matte and shimmer blush hues.
Housing ten hues that suit all skin tones, the Glamourous Blush Palette is perfect for makeup artists and blush-lovers alike. Harbouring hues that range from baby pinks to deep berries, in highly pigmented, blendable formulas, the collection is an essential for a flawlessly enhanced finish.

ARTDECO Long Lashes Mascara is the perfect choice for creating a stunning, dominant lash look.
Boasting a high-quality formula which defines and magnifies the lashes with a volumising effect, Long Lashes Mascara has a precision brush which coats even the finest of lashes in high-opacity coverage. Enriched with natural ingredients, this intense bodifying mascara nourishes the eyelashes with each application and is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
Formulated using Carnuaba Wax, Vitamin E and Panthenol, Long Lashes Mascara imparts high levels of hydration to every single eyelash, resulting in a conditioned, supple finish that will be noticed by everyone around you. With intense colour payoff, Long Lashes Mascara gives the lashes the optical illusion of added length and thickness.

A jet black mascara and eyelash treatment.
Infused with natural ingredients, Lash Alert Mascara Black not only volumises lashes but promotes growth too. Brush through lashes closely and accurately with the arched wand designed to hug and coat from root to tip. With a fibre-enhanced formula, lashes look thicker, longer and darker leaving eyes awakened and defined.

Talika Lipocils Expert is the safe solution to enhancing the beauty of your lashes!
Working in just 28 days, this lash enhancing treatment is a total dream for your eyelashes. Whether you feel your lashes look too short, sparse, brittle or lack shine and curl, or if you just dream of longer, shinier, sexier looking lashes, Lipocils Expert is your answer!
The new and improved formula is made from a blend of natural actives to regrow sparse lashes and magnify the natural colour and curl of your lashes. Natural lashes are affected by so many factors before they reach their maximum length: pollution, make up, make up remove, lash extension and more; Lipocils Expert works to stimulate your lashes and allows them to reach their full potential.
Boabab Leaf Extract and Sour Orange Extract help to reduce damage caused by UV rays and protects against suns radiation whilst acting against oxygen damage to the skin surrounding the eyes. 100% Natural, Lipocils Expert has a double applicator which combines a sponge tip and mascara brush for targeted or even product distribution.
Lipocils Expert is the only product over the last 60 years able to claim and prove the eyelashes growth up to 4.4mm in 28 days. The unique formula is enriched with Nettle Extract, anti ageing Peptides and Silk Proteins and promotes 36% growth and over 50% deeper natural colour which make the eyelashes feel longer, thicker and nourished.

Laura Geller GlamLASH Dramatic Volumizing Mascara is a classic volumising mascara for intense lash drama.
Designed to create starlet worthy lashes with just one sweep of the brush, GlamLASH Dramatic Volumizing Mascara delivers full lash contact to separate, thicken and lengthen the lashes whilst delivering intense volume.
With a highly pigmented and long lasting formula designed to create larger than life lashes, GlamLASH Dramatic Volumizing Mascara leaves the lashes looking luxuriously glamorous and ready for their close up.
Capture all the glamour of Old Hollywood with this best-selling jet black mascara.

A compact bronzing powder.
Available in a range of colours, Limited Edition Bronzing Powder adds a subtle, sun-kissed glow to all skin tones. With a water-resistant formula, apply the high coverage powder around the face for a long-wearing, buildable finish.

product_description:
A forty-two-shade eyeshadow palette.
The ultimate beauty palette, Violet Voss' Ride Or Die Palette is a one stop shop for all your shadow needs. With a mix of matte, shimmer and metal finishes, each of the forty-two shadows boasts an ultra-blendable, highly pigmented formula guaranteed to achieve an easy, professional and must have eye look.

A floral inspired collection of finely milled eye shadows.
Especially designed to fit your favourite ARTDECO compact, the Hypnotic Blossom Eyeshadows are ideal for both at home and on the go use. Finely milled and highly pigmented, these spring time hues can be blended together or worn alone for seamless, stay all day finish.
colour: 11 Pearly Summer Beige 0.8g – HK $60.10

product_description:
A six shade blush palette containing a collection of pink and coral hues.
Developed by the experts at Viseart, the 02 Rose Coral Blush Palette contains the perfect shades in both pearl and matte finishes to compliment a number of different skin tones. Each and every one of the six powdered blushes has been triple-milled to ensure you achieve an effortlessly blended finish with ease. Featuring three varying pinks and an ombre of corals, this palette truly has a shade to compliment every look.

A smoothing primer that guarantees the flawless application of your favourite foundation.
Infused with a number of skin conscious natural extracts, the Time To Prime Silky Soft Skin Primer is an essential step to creating a ultra-smooth base. The moisturising texture applies seamlessly across the surface creating an imperfection free veil that is ready for the next step of your routine.
product_name: Time To Prime Silky Soft Skin Primer

product_description:
Violet Voss Violet's Secret Weapon Glitter Adhesive is a versatile cosmetic adhesive that primes and preps the eyes whilst keeping any loose pigments and glitters in place all day long.
Featuring a convenient transparent formula, Violet's Secret Weapon Glitter Adhesive is created specifically for beauty junkies and professional makeup artists alike, allowing for true and complete creative control.
Working perfectly as the base for the application of loose cosmetics, such as shimmers, glitters and pigments, Violet's Secret Weapon Glitter Adhesive also ensures that the application of the eyeliner remains smooth and pristine whilst blotchy eyeshadow is eradicated, resulting in a sumptuous finish for the eyes and masterfully completing any look beautifully.
With the ability to maintain any loose cosmetic design effortlessly, Violet's Secret Weapon Glitter Adhesive is a certified beauty essential for any beauty enthusiast who loves to experiment with their makeup.

Complementing bronzers and blushes to create a variety of looks.
2 In 1 Mosaic Powder combines a variety of five different blush and bronzer shades in a single palette. All individually chosen to be the perfect accompaniment to one another the hues can be worn all separately or swirled together to create a unique colour to complete your desired look.
colour: Spice 8g – HK $61.60

product_description:
A rich, fade resistant lip colour ideal for creating a bold and beautiful lip look in minutes.
Lightweight, yet extremely pigmented Lip Tar Alchemically Altered offers rich autumn inspired colour that lasts. Paired with an expertly designed doe foot applicator, achieving precision with a liquid lip has never been so easy. The caring formula is enriched with a concoction of natural oils that work to deliver a smooth base, ready for the even application of colour in a single sweep leaving lips looking and feeling adventure ready.
colour: Alchemy – HK $25.20
product_name: Lip Tar RTW Alchemically Altered - Alchemy

product_description:
nugg Intense Lip Boosting Mask nourishes and hydrates the lips, resulting in a plumper, fresher, more kissable finish effortlessly.
Lusciously textured and luxurious to use, Intense Lip Boosting Mask coats the lips in supreme care, imparting moisture at a cellular level and diminishing the appearance of fine lines, creases and wrinkles around the delicate area.
Formulated using Shea Butter and Coconut Oil, Intense Lip Boosting Mask conditions the pout whilst the addition of Liquorice Root Complex ensures that this enchanting elixir plumps the lips for a fuller, more youthful effect that will leave everyone in awe.
Boasting a minty flavour for ultimate freshness, this lip care necessity is packaged within an aesthetically-pleasing spherical golden case that would make an attractive addition to any dressing table or cosmetic collection.
Get lips that you will be proud of with Intense Lip Boosting Mask from the experts at nugg.

A black, lengthening mascara.
Creating enviable lashes, Best Length Extreme Lengthening Mascara lifts and separates. With long and short bristles, use the wand provided to reach from root to tip, maximising length and visibly stretching.
product_name: Best Length Extreme Lengthening Mascara Black

product_description:
Antipodes Skin Brightening Mineral Finishing Powder is a translucent silky Mineral finishing powder created to maximise the length of your make-up.
Minimising unwelcome shine and open pores, Mineral Finishing Powder refines your complexion with a perfect matte finish.
Boasting Vinanza Performance Plus, a rich blend of Antioxidants from Sauvignon Blanc Grape Seeds and the Super Fruit Kiwi, this lightweight powder lightly dusts over the face for a fresh and bright appearance whilst improving elasticity and firmness within the skin. The caring formula locks in essential moisture and protects from oxidative stress, ensuring your face isnÉt dry.
Ideal for skin that is oily, blemish-prone and affected by rosacea, Skin Brightening Mineral Finishing Powder leaves the skin soft to touch with a healthy, radiant glow.

A sun shielding face primer.
Suited to all skin tones and types, Mineral Makeup Primer SPF30 is a gentle, unscented skin perfecting cream. Lightweight and water resistant, use alone or under makeup for a radiant, long-lasting finish.
product_name: Mineral Makeup Primer SPF30 Daydream Unscented 30ml

product_description:
A book of four eyeshadows.
In a small, magnetic palette, EYE-Mazing Eyeshadow houses four small strips of colour. With shimmering and pearlescent eyeshadows there's darker and lighter tones to create day to night looks. Perfume free and suitable for sensitive eyes, blend and build on the go with the mirror provided.

Anastasia Beverly Hills Pro Series Contour Kit Medium-Tan
Anastasia Beverly Hills Pro Series Contour Kit Medium-Tan is the ultimate palette for sculpting and contouring your best features.
Highly acclaimed and loved by professional makeup artists and makeup enthusiasts alike, Pro Series Contour Kit Medium-Tan is ideal for medium to tanned skin tones and features six decadent facial powders designed to contour, sculpt and highlight the complexion.
Limited edition, Pro Series Contour Kit Medium-Tan contains all the shades needed to emphasise the eyes, cheekbones, nose and jawline. The high performance, pressed powder formulas are hypoallergenic and help exaggerate your best features with natural looking shadows and define and streamline with highlights.
Pro Series Contour Kit Medium-Tan is the perfect palette for creating the illusion of a picture perfect complexion and is loved by celebrities for the ability to look youthful and more defined with artful contouring.

A palette containing three shimmer and three matte shades all in varying neutral to brown hues.
Cashmere Theory Palette boasts six removable buttery textured shadows all housed in a palette casing that transforms into an easel style stand for easy access when creating a multitude of cool toned looks. With a finely milled powder formula the shades blend effortlessly into one another working in synergy to produce professional results at home.

A travel friendly collection of cosmetics containing all you need for that perfect close up.
Upgrade your selfie game with the Love Your Selfie 2 collection from PUR. Packed with exclusive, never-seen-before shades, it has all you need to create an array of photo-ready day and night time looks. Combining eight silky soft eyeshadows in easy to wear shades, a universally flattering bronzer and highlighter, plus a translucent finishing powder, mascara, lip pencil and lip gloss, this comprehensive set is all you need for full face perfection.

A collection of highly pigmented eyeshadows that are housed within a mirrored palette. Drenched Metal Eyeshadow Palette features nineteen metallic hues and one matte nude base colour that can be used to create an array of dimensional styles and looks. The blendable consistency works smoothly over the skin and boasts longevity without fading or becoming heavy.

ARTDECO Make Up Base is a foundation primer with anti-ageing benefits to create an ideal base for long-lasting make-up.
Create the perfect blank canvas for your make-up with ARTDECO Make Up Base. A light, gel formulation blended with an Amino Peptide Complex gives pre-ageing and anti-ageing effects whilst concealing wrinkles and small imperfections.
This fragrance free foundation primer is comfortable to wear and easy to apply and always ensures make-up is longer lasting and smoother to apply.

A collection of complexion perfecting products.
Evening and enhancing, Beauty Essentials Trio is a compact, travel friendly must have. With a dual ended brush, shimmering highlighter and foundation & bronzer duo, keep in your bag for instant top ups and seamless application.

Illamasqua Masquara is the ultimate mascara for sexy, well defined lashes.
Highly acclaimed as the 'Wonderbra' of mascaras, Masquara is hailed as one of the hottest makeup must haves of its time and is sure to become an iconic beauty staple in your makeup bag. Enriched with Botanical Oils and Waxes and Vitamins, Masquara lengthens, defines and dramatises the lashes to extremes.
If the eyes are the windows of the soul, Masquara reveals a heart of darkness and sophistication and leaves the lashes looking voluminous, bold and dramatic with a touch of glamour.

A voluminous, ultra-black mascara.
With an innovative silicone brush and a lightweight formula, the Mascara GMS647 Double D Dramatic Black works to create a separated, lengthened finish with added drama. Infused with several nourishing ingredients, the innovative formula styles and protects each lash.
product_name: Mascara Double D GMS647 Dramatic Black 8ml

product_description:
ARTDECO 3 in 1 Eye Primer is a correcting, concealing and long wearing primer which prolongs the life of your eye makeup.
Giving the eyes a radiant glow, 3 In 1 Eye Primer corrects irregularities on the eye area by neutralising your skin tone. Fine Porous Silica in the formula makes the eyelids appear even and visibly smoother whilst giving the eye a fresh and wide-eyed look.
This light and creamy primer applies easily onto the eyelid and helps your desired eye colour to stay put and blend evenly without creasing or smudging. Giving your chosen eye colour a boost by appearing purer in colour, 3 In 1 Eye Primer is available in two different shades to suit your skin tone.
With a weightless and natural matte finish, 3 In 1 Eye Primer is set to be a makeup bag essential!

product_description:
Laura Geller Baked Split Highlighter Duo with Brush is a gorgeous powder highlighter duo complete with dual ended applicator brush.
Simply illuminating, Baked Split Highlighter Duo with Brush has been exclusively designed to create dimension for the complexion whilst brightening your best facial features. Perfect for creating the coveted lit from within glow, this baked formula casts a gentle highlight wherever it is swept onto the skin and gives the entire complexion instant radiance.
Featuring two deluxe shades with sheer and shimmering finishes, Baked Split Highlighter Duo with Brush will complement all skin tones. The dual ended brush includes a small brush head for targeted application on the brow bone and inner corners of the eyes whilst the larger sponge end is great for highlighting your cheekbones and facial contours.
product_name: Baked Split Highlighter Duo with Brush Portofino And French Vanilla 8g

product_description: A travel-friendly palette that features three iridescent hues that are ideal for strobing the complexion. Housed within a mirrored compact, Highlighter Trio glides smoothly onto the skin and blends to a seamless finish. The lightweight formulation boasts longevity and high colour-payoff.

Combining their two best sellers, Laura's Star Performers Baked Balance n Brighten And Bronze n Brighten Duo create the perfect base. Including a full-size foundation and bronzer, wear together to cover, correct and enhance all skin tones with two easy, lightweight and long-lasting steps.
colour: Medium – HK $252.90

product_description:
A palette of six velvety highlighting powders.
Enhance cheekbones, brow bones and collarbones with Anastasia Beverly Hills' Ultimate Glow Kit. Displayed in a mirrored palette, six ultra-fine and intensely pigmented powders can be blended together for a long lasting glide of shimmer without the fallout. Including a mix of pearl and shimmer textures in glistening golds, coppers and bronzes there's a glow for every occasion.

Anna Sui Length & Separation Mascara is a limited edition mascara that defines the lashes and imparts truly spectacular colour that will complete any look flawlessly.
Boasting a Rose Hip-infused formula, Length & Separation Mascara deeply conditions and moisturises each individual strand, ensuring that the lashes remain soft and supple. The inclusion of Glycoge and Panthenol means that this lash tint also protects against harmful environmental radicals and heals any existing damage effortlessly.
Available in a selection of vibrant hues, Length & Separation Mascara allows for creativity to flow, and guaranteed to remain intact all day long, this lash enhancer certifies itself as an absolute must-have for any beauty junkie or Anna Sui fanatic.
Be amazed by your own lashes thanks to Length & Separation Mascara.

Kevin Aucoin The Celestial Bronzing Veil is a unique multi-purpose powder bronzer that combines hints of gold, copper and warm pigments to create a boost of radiance.
A light dusting of Celestial Bronzing Veil is all it takes to feign a week in the sun without hitting the (fake tan) bottle. Available in a selection of radiant shades, The Celestial Bronzing Veil lifts sun-starved complexions for a warm, healthy look without any orange tones, chalkiness or glitter.
Perfect for giving the skin an immediate shot of radiance, The Celestial Bronzing Veil features a graduated palette making it highly versatile for the face and eyes. The flawless application is enhanced with a Nylon inspired formula whilst the pressed powder formulation glides effortlessly onto the skin.
The Celestial Bronzing Veil utilises Micro-milled Crystal Pigments to highlight and sculpt the face and is the perfect way to achieve an ethereal sun kissed glow.
colour: Tropical Nights 9.6g – HK $363.60

product_description:
Kevyn Aucoin The Curling Mascara is an essential mascara which shapes the lashes into a delicate curl for a flirtatious look.
Perfect for daily use, The Curling Mascara adds length and volume to the lashes and has a clump-free, smudge-proof formula which stays put throughout the day yet is easily removed with warm water.
The uniquely styled brush allows you to get close to the roots for thicker, longer looking lashes in an instant whilst the ground-breaking formula shrinks to the lash to enhance the natural curl.
The Curling Mascara ensures magnificent eyes all day long and gives the illusion of naturally curled lashes whilst the classic pitch black hue separates the eyelashes for a dramatic, wide eyed look.

An extra-large customisable palette.
With a textured, woodgrain detail, Golden Grain Extra Large Magnetic Palette holds and displays your choice of makeup. With a golden, glittered foil, stylishly keep and carry individual pans of eyeshadow, blusher and highlighter.
product_name: Golden Grain Extra Large Magnetic Palette

product_description:
A mattifying face primer.
Smoothing the skin, Prime No Shine Mattifying Face Primer blurs large pores and fine lines. Creating the perfect makeup base, apply the non-greasy formula under foundation for an even, long-lasting finish.
